com.sensoro.beacon.kit

Class SensoroBeaconManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.SensoroBeaconManager

  • public class SensoroBeaconManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can manage the sensoro beacon service.The class uses the singleton mode.If you want to get the instance of the class,use getInstance(Context)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SensoroBeaconManager.BeaconManagerListener
      The callback interface when beacons appear, disappear, update.

      • setOutOfRangeDelay

        public void setOutOfRangeDelay(long delayMills)
        Set the delay (in milliseconds) of disappearence of the beacon.If the beacon can not be found in this time,SensoroBeaconManager.BeaconManagerListener.onGoneBeacon(Beacon) will be called.
        Parameters:
        delayMills - The delay (in milliseconds)of the disappearence of the beacon.The default value is 8 seconds.
